      void PassengerCar.alight(java.lang.Integer departingPassengers)

      java.lang.Integer PassengerCar.board(java.lang.Integer newPassengers)
      Adds the given number of new passengers to the number on board the carriage.
      Constructors in asgn2RollingStock that throw TrainException 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a freight car object.
      Locomotive(java.lang.Integer grossWeight, java.lang.String classification)
      Constructs a new locomotive object with a fixed gross weight and classification code.
      PassengerCar(java.lang.Integer grossWeight, java.lang.Integer numberOfSeats)
      Constructs a passenger car with a known weight and a fixed number of seats.
      RollingStock(java.lang.Integer grossWeight)
      Constructs a railway carriage with a specific gross weight (i.e., the carriage's weight when fully laden).
